content.text: Hi I'm on the way to the dog park with my pug, Corky.  How is your day going?
Great! I'm trying to spend as much time with my sister and Charlie as possible.  What's a pug?
A pug is a type of dog!  They are very cute and have short snouts.
What's your favorite type of beer?
I've tried 35 different types of beer in my lifetime and I really like stouts.
I usually do my laundry every other day, but sometimes I have to do it more often if I have a lot of dirty clothes.
That's interesting!  I usually do mine once a week unless I have to do it more often.
I love spending time with my friends and family.  Do you have any hobbies?
Yes, I love to cook and I would like to open a restaurant someday.  I'm also trying to get better at doing regular expressions.
That's so cool!  I've spent way too much money on gummy worms.  Do you have any pets?
I have a pug named Corky and he's the best dog ever
